int main()
{
	 #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
     	//freopen("in.txt","r",stdin);
		//freopen("out.txt","w",stdout);
     #endif
     ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);


		ll n;
		cin>>n;
		ll a[n+1];ll dp[n+1];
		forall(i,0,n-1)
		{cin>>a[i];dp[i]=1LL<<44LL;}

		dp[0]=0;

		forall(i,0,n-1)
		{
			for(ll j=1;j<=i;j=j<<1)
			{
				dp[i]=min(dp[i],dp[i-j]+abs(a[i]-a[i-j]));
			}
		}
		cout<<dp[n-1]<<endl;



	return 0;
}
